title: New: xxyyxx – Alone
content:
This new(ish) cut from Orlando producer xxyyxx kinda reminds me of James Blake’s early work, in it’s spacious feel and soulful inclinations.

Playing much upon the use of well-timed silences within the music, as well as pitch-shifted vocals that prey upon the previously mentioned more minimal moments. It’s relatively simplistic in make-up, far lacking the complexity of many of xxyyxx’s peers (Balam Acab for example), yet it doesn’t feel lacking at all, and thrives upon it’s elegant composition. Check out Alone below.

XXYYXX//Alone by xxyyxx
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
